Welcome to ${object.company_id.name}

Dear ${object.name},

Welcome to the Family,

Thank you for accepting the offer and choosing to join Family.

I am your Onboarding Advisor, welcome you to Onboarding Program. I will enable your transition into and will support you in your onboarding journey.

Please go through this mail carefully, as it has important information regarding your joining.

You need to fill in your personal details and upload the required documents under the respective sections in the CSM Onboarding link below, % if object.profile_submit_date: by ${object.profile_submit_date.strftime('%d-%b-%Y')} % else: NA % endif .

Click Here

It is vital for you to review your information carefully and highlight any discrepancies to me.

1. Personal Details :
  • Profile details should be filled up based on the records of 10th Standard Certificate or Aadhaar Card.
  • Profile Photograph - Resolution of the photo should be 72 DPI with white/off white background and formal attire only.
2. Education & Training Details :

Under Education and training you need to upload.

  • 10th Standard Mark sheet and Certificate
  • 12th Standard Mark sheet and Certificate
  • Diploma Mark sheet and certificate (if applicable)
  • Degree Mark sheet (all semesters) and Certificate / Provisional Certificate
  • PG Mark sheet and Certificate (if applicable) / Provisional Certificate
  • Certificates of Certification courses (if applicable)
3. Identification Proofs :

Under Identification Section you need to upload the ID Proof documents:

  • Aadhaar Card
  • PAN Card
  • Driving License
  • Passport (Valid Copy). If you have applied for a Passport, please provide the file number along with the date of application
4. Work Experience :

Under Work Experience Section you need to upload the previous organization documents.

  • Service/Experience Certificates and Relieving letters of all Previous Organizations (if applicable)
  • Directorship/Partnership-Company registration document or Dissolution document (if applicable)
  • For freelance/Self-employed- Experience letters, Bank Statements or Client letters (if applicable)
5. Health Section :
  • Under Health Section you need to upload the Fitness Certificate signed by Registered Doctor / Practitioner.
  • Undertaking, if you have any health issues.

Upon completion of the Profile updating process, an auto-generated confirmation will be sent to your registered email ID.

On your date of joining ${object.tmp_join_date.strftime('%d-%b-%Y')}, it is mandatory for you to report at Office at 10:00 AM in formal wear. You have to carry all the original certificates for hard copy verification, including the experience Letter Or Resignation acceptance letter/email from your immediate last organisation (mentioning your last working day).

Please feel free to contact below persons, if you have any questions related to documents or need any support.
